item.title: CloudEvents
item.description: CloudEvents Github CNCF Incubating project since 2018. Summary Standardization is a general need in all fields after some technique is widely used. In the last few years the trend for scalable, event-driven systems grew massively. Everybody and everything is communicating in events. And all systems face the same question at some point - what should our events look like. If you were smart enough you asked the question rather earlier than later.
